Capt.Price, 
1. go to your Program filesjavajre7bin (or Program files (x86))
2. find java.exe
3. right-click it, click Properties
4. set compatibility with Windows 7 (or XP)
5. Click OK
6. open the jar
Thx ( Wasteland Kings is best game in this pack )
